donate-copy: From Argentina you can make a donation through Mercado Pago or Paypal if you're anywhere else in the world. This helps me to keep this website active on internet.
outdated-room: This room belongs to an old version of the app. Please, create a new one.

room-code.hint: This code works as a password. You'll use it to configure the room in order to play. Do not forget it.
